#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define mod 1000000007
int main()
{
	int m , n , p ;
	int bi , bj ;
	cin >> m >> n >> p ;
	
	long long int Mat[m+1][n+1];

	memset(Mat,0,sizeof(Mat));

	// cout << Mat[4][1] << endl <<sizeof(Mat);
	while(p--)
	{
		cin >> bi >> bj ;
		Mat[bi][bj] = -1;
	}

	if(Mat[1][1] == -1)
	{
		cout<< 0 ;
		return 0;
	}

	for(int i = 1 ; i<m+1 ; i++)
	{
		if (Mat[i][1] == -1) break;
		Mat[i][1] = 1 ; 
	}
	for(int j = 1 ; j<n+1 ; j++)
	{
		if (Mat[1][j] == -1) break;
		Mat[1][j] = 1 ; 
	}

	for(int i = 2 ; i<m+1 ; i++)
		for(int j = 2 ; j<n+1 ; j++)
		{
			if(Mat[i][j] == -1)
				continue;
			if(Mat[i-1][j] > 0)
			Mat[i][j] = (Mat[i][j] + Mat[i-1][j])%mod;
			if(Mat[i][j-1] > 0)
			Mat[i][j] = (Mat[i][j] + Mat[i][j-1]) %mod;
			// cout << "i = " << i << "j="<<j << "----- "<< Mat[i][j]<<endl;
		}
	if(Mat[m][n] > 0)
		cout << Mat[m][n]%mod <<endl ;
	else cout<< 0 ;
	// cout<<endl<<Mat[1][1]<<endl<<Mat[100][100]<<endl<<Mat[1000][1000];
	// cout << endl <<Mat[99][100] << endl <<Mat[100][99];
	return 0;
}
